# VEHICLE::VEHICLE_SET_RAMP_AND_RAMMING_CARS_TAKE_DAMAGE

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** takeDamage: If set to false, the ramming and ramp cars will not take damage when used
